otherNames: Golden Crow from Chaos,Chaos Golden Crow,混沌金乌,混沌金乌动态漫画,Phoenix of Chaos
synopsis: The Golden Crow appears in this world, burns all the wastelands, shocks all ages, and controls everything! Prince Jinwu, reincarnated, caused countless shocks in the heavens and worlds, the king was reborn, and started all over again!
